import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import FadeIn from "./FadeIn"; const TermOfUse: React.FC = () => { useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); }, []); return (

Terms of Use (EULA)

Last updated: November 20, 2025

These Terms of Use ("Terms") govern your use of the{" "} EasyWrite AI mobile application (the "App") operated by Phan Quang Duy.

By downloading or using the App, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, then you may not access the App.

1. AI DISCLAIMER (IMPORTANT)

EasyWrite AI uses Artificial Intelligence (Google Gemini) to provide grammar checking and text generation.

  • Accuracy: While we strive for accuracy, AI models can make mistakes ("hallucinations"). The suggestions, corrections, and emails generated by the App may not always be 100% accurate, contextually correct, or grammatically perfect.
  • No Professional Advice: The App is a tool for assistance only. It does not replace professional human editors, translators, or legal advice.
  • User Responsibility: You are solely responsible for reviewing and verifying any content generated by the App before using, sending, or publishing it. We are not liable for any consequences resulting from the use of the generated content (e.g., sending an incorrect email to a boss).

2. USER CONTENT & DATA

  • You retain ownership of any text you input into the App.
  • You grant us a license to process your input text to provide the requested services (e.g., sending it to the AI provider).
  • Local Storage: You acknowledge that your history and saved items are stored locally on your device. We are not responsible for data loss caused by deleting the app or device malfunction.
  • You agree not to input any sensitive, confidential, or illegal content into the App.

3. PROHIBITED USES

You agree not to use the App:

  • In any way that violates any applicable national or international law.
  • To generate content that is hate speech, threatening, or promotes violence.
  • To spam or overload the API service.
  • To attempt to reverse engineer the App's source code.
{/*

4. SUBSCRIPTIONS AND PURCHASES

  • Free Version: The App is provided for free with limitations and may display advertisements.
  • Premium Subscription: We may offer a paid subscription ("Pro") to remove ads and unlock unlimited features.
  • Payments: All payments are processed through the Apple App Store or Google Play Store. We do not store your credit card information.
  • Refunds: Refund requests must be made directly to Apple or Google in accordance with their refund policies.
*/}

4. SUBSCRIPTIONS AND PURCHASES

  • Free Version: The App is provided for free with limitations. {/* Đã xóa đoạn "and may display advertisements" */}
  • Premium Subscription: We may offer a paid subscription ("Pro") to unlock unlimited features.{" "} {/* Đã xóa đoạn "remove ads" */}
  • Payments: All payments are processed through the Apple App Store or Google Play Store. We do not store your credit card information.
  • Refunds: Refund requests must be made directly to Apple or Google in accordance with their refund policies.

5. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY

The App and its original content (excluding User Content), features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of Phan Quang Duy and its licensors.

6. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY

In no event shall Phan Quang Duy, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from your access to or use of or inability to access or use the App.

7. CHANGES

We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time.

8. CONTACT US

If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:{" "} phanquangduytvt.work@gmail.com
